sourcesContent:
import { Container,Box,Text } from '@chakra-ui/react'
import { buildTransform } from 'framer-motion'
import React from 'react'

const Homepage = () => {
  return (
    //conatiner helps in adjusting the screens when resized 
    <Container maxW='xl' centerContent>
        <Box
        d="flex"
        justifyContent="center"
        p={3}
        bg={"white"}
        w="100%"
        m="40px 0 15px 0"
        borderRadius="lg"
        borderWidth="1px"
        >
            <Text
      fontSize={['2xl', '3xl', '4xl']} // Responsive font size
      fontFamily="Work Sans, sans-serif"
      fontWeight="bold" // Make the text bold
      color={['blue.500', 'green.500', 'black']} // Responsive text color
      textAlign="center" // Center-align the text
      textShadow="2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)" // Add a subtle text shadow
    >
      Intelli Chat
    </Text>
        </Box>

    </Container>
  )
}

export default Homepage
